title: Kedarkantha
description: A 6-day trek through the Kedarkantha peak, offering stunning views of snow-capped Himalayan ranges.

days.detailedDescription: Roll call & Pick up from Delhi at 1-2 AM & Pick up from Prince Chowk, Dehradun at 7 AM. Reach Sankri and check in to the campsite. Dinner & Overnight stay at Sankri.
days.distance: 420 KMS from Delhi, 200 KMS from Dehradun
days.duration: 12 HRS from Delhi, 8-9 HRS from Dehradun

days.detailedDescription: Breakfast & start the hike from Saur Village & reach half-frozen Juda Ka Talab (lake). Enjoy snacks after the trek. Explore the area & indulge in outdoor activities. Dinner & Overnight stay at Juda Ka Talab. Stargaze, if you want.

Post breakfast, we will start our trek to the Kedarkantha base camp. We will pass through beautiful pine forests and meadows. Reach the base camp and enjoy the mesmerizing views of the surrounding peaks. Dinner and overnight stay at the base camp.

Early morning wake-up call for the summit climb. We will start our trek to the Kedarkantha peak (12,500 ft). Enjoy the breathtaking 360-degree view of the Himalayan ranges from the summit. Descend back to the base camp. Dinner & overnight stay at the base camp.
Post breakfast, we will start our descent back to Sankri. Reach Sankri and enjoy the bonfire with fellow trekkers. Dinner and overnight stay at Sankri.
Post breakfast, check out from the campsite and proceed towards Dehradun. Reach Dehradun by evening. Tour ends with happy memories.

exclusions: Trek Gear (available at the campsite on rent)
Food during transit to and from the trek starting point
Any added expense before, during or after the trek including medical or unforeseen natural calamities.

title: Har Ki Dun
description: A 7-day trek to the cradle of Gods, Har Ki Dun valley, offering breathtaking views of snow-capped Himalayan peaks and ancient villages.

days.detailedDescription: Roll call & Pick up from Delhi at 1-2 AM & Pick up from Prince Chowk, Dehradun at 7 AM. Reach Sankri and check in to the campsite. Dinner & Overnight stay at Sankri.
days.distance: 420 KMS from Delhi, 200 KMS from Dehradun
days.duration: 12 HRS from Delhi, 8-9 HRS from Dehradun

days.detailedDescription: Post breakfast, we will start our trek to Taluka. We will pass through dense pine forests and cross the Supin River. Reach Taluka and enjoy the scenic beauty. Dinner and overnight stay at Taluka.
Post breakfast, we will start our trek to Osla. We will pass through beautiful meadows and traditional villages. Reach Osla and explore the village. Dinner and overnight stay at Osla.

Post breakfast, we will start our trek to Har Ki Dun. We will pass through dense forests and cross the river. Reach Har Ki Dun and enjoy the mesmerizing views of the surrounding peaks. Dinner and overnight stay at Har Ki Dun.

days.description: Explore Har Ki Dun & trek to Jaundhar Glacier.
days.detailedDescription: Early morning wake-up call to explore Har Ki Dun valley. Post breakfast, we will start our trek to Jaundhar Glacier. Enjoy the breathtaking views of the glacier. Descend back to Har Ki Dun. Dinner & overnight stay at Har Ki Dun.
Post breakfast, we will start our descent back to Osla. Reach Osla and enjoy the bonfire with fellow trekkers. Dinner and overnight stay at Osla.

Post breakfast, we will start our descent back to Sankri. Reach Sankri and enjoy the bonfire with fellow trekkers. Check out from the campsite and proceed towards Dehradun. Reach Dehradun by evening. Tour ends with happy memories.

bestTimeToVisit: Mid-March to June, September to November
exclusions: Trek Gear (available at the campsite on rent)
Food during transit to and from the trek starting point
Any added expense before, during or after the trek including medical or unforeseen natural calamities.

title: Valley of flowers
description: An 8-day trek to the enchanting Valley of Flowers National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, showcasing a vibrant tapestry of alpine flowers and breathtaking landscapes.

days.detailedDescription: Roll call & Pick up from Delhi at 1-2 AM. Reach Haridwar and check in to the hotel. Dinner & Overnight stay at Haridwar.

Post breakfast, we will start our drive to Joshimath. We will pass through scenic landscapes and picturesque villages. Reach Joshimath and check in to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay at Joshimath.

days.description: Drive to Govindghat & trek to Ghangaria.
days.detailedDescription: Post breakfast, we will start our drive to Govindghat. From Govindghat, we will start our trek to Ghangaria. We will pass through beautiful forests and cross the river. Reach Ghangaria and enjoy the scenic beauty. Dinner and overnight stay at Ghangaria.

Post breakfast, we will start our trek to the Valley of Flowers. We will pass through lush green meadows and witness a vibrant array of flowers. Explore the valley and enjoy the mesmerizing views. Descend back to Ghangaria. Dinner and overnight stay at Ghangaria.

days.description: Trek to Hemkund Sahib & back to Ghangaria.
days.detailedDescription: Early morning wake-up call for the trek to Hemkund Sahib. We will pass through scenic landscapes and reach the holy shrine. Seek blessings and enjoy the serene atmosphere. Descend back to Ghangaria. Dinner & overnight stay at Ghangaria.
Post breakfast, we will start our descent back to Govindghat. Reach Govindghat and enjoy the scenic beauty. Dinner and overnight stay at Govindghat.
Post breakfast, we will start our drive to Joshimath. Reach Joshimath and check in to the hotel. Dinner and overnight stay at Joshimath.
Post breakfast, check out from the hotel and proceed towards Haridwar. Reach Haridwar by evening. Tour ends with happy memories.

exclusions: Trek Gear (available at the campsite on rent)
Food during transit to and from the trek starting point
Any added expense before, during or after the trek including medical or unforeseen natural calamities.
Entry fees and permits for Valley of Flowers and Hemkund Sahib
